column4: : are you running Ubuntu 7.10? That has version of aMSN as part of the Universe repository
: You can try the generic Linux installer which is on the aMSN site : http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/amsn/amsn-0.97RC1-1.tcl84.x86.package
: Or take the leap and go to 7.10.. it is worth it!
nty. I'm waiting for the next LTS, so I can LTS->LTS. It seems more stable to me.
how do I install it? D:
: Right click on the download and set the permissions to allow execute. Then double click and run in terminal.. Follow the prompts etc..
wow, wtf. It's installing a lot of autopackage stuff and asking me for my pass
: Yeah. Maybe the 7.10 upgrade would be easier? :)
Thank you for your patience. Installation of your package will now proceed.
: Hope it works for you. Where does it install it?
well, it's pretty. Like a Windows installer :|
and all I had to do was type amsn after it was doen.
: Hopefully it is the latest version.
